original_text: Hezekiah had stopped the water coming out from the higher spring at Gihon. Instead, he caused the water to go down to the west side of the City of David. Hezekiah was successful in all the things that he did.
korean_text: 이 히스기야가 또 기혼의 윗샘물을 막아 그 아래로부터 다윗 성 서쪽으로 곧게 끌어들였으니 히스기야가 그의 모든 일에 형통하였더라

sentences.original_text: coming out from the higher spring at Gihon
Instead, he caused the water to go down
to the west side of the City of David
in all the things that he did
